Text: "Fatbeard" is the seventh episode of the thirteenth season of the American animated television series "South Park".
Triplets:<>"Fatbeard"
1:
--------------------
Text: Fatbeard:  The 188th overall episode of the series, it originally aired on Comedy Central in the United States on April 22, 2009 and in the United Kingdom on April 24, 2009.
Triplets:<Fatbeard
2:
--------------------
Text: Fatbeard:  It was the mid-season finale, marking the final "South Park" episode for six months.
Triplets:<It was
3:
--------------------
Text: Fatbeard:  In the episode, Cartman misinterprets news reports about piracy in the Indian Ocean to mean the return of the classic era of swashbuckling pirates, and misleads a handful of South Park boys to voyage to Mogadishu to start a pirate crew.
